GameDBStringTable.LocalizedStrings:
ITEM_ACTIVATION_COST Activation Cost: ITEM_ACTIVATION_COST_ENERGY ITEM_ACTIVATION_COST_ENERGY ITEM_ACTIVATION_NO_ENERGY Not enough<color=SOTS_COLOR_ENERGY> energy points</color> for activation. ITEM_ACTIVATION_NO_DUPLICATES Only one item of each kind can be equipped at a time.
EQUIPMENT_DATAPAD Datapad $1$2$4 EQUIPMENT_DATAPAD_LORE Most of us carried a little notepad or something. He had this big Datapad. He looked funny going door to door like a taxman, but you know what? He is already an admiral, while our soles are still getting thinner.
EQUIPMENT_BAIT_FLAG Bait Flag EQUIPMENT_BAIT_FLAG_DESCRIPTION Shows the statistics of a commander as weaker than they actually are, luring the enemy to attack them. Does not work on commanders with the Spy skill. (Similar to the Easy prey ability.) EQUIPMENT_BAIT_FLAG_LORE Common! A white flag? It is the laziest trap in the galaxy. Why do they fall for it again and again? The next time I see a white flag, I shoot first and ask ... never!
EQUIPMENT_HOLO_SCARECROW Holo Scarecrow EQUIPMENT_HOLO_SCARECROW_DESCRIPTION Removes 20% of the units from a neutral army before the battle. EQUIPMENT_HOLO_SCARECROW_LORE During the holy war, the Brotherhood used to carry them as battle altars. It emits a huge menacing 3D image of Allmother above an army. It gives me shivers every time I see it.
EQUIPMENT_KINETIC_GENERATOR Kinetic Generator $1$2$4 EQUIPMENT_KINETIC_GENERATOR_LORE Recuperation. Because everyone who grew up as a poor child in some "beyond the galaxy's edge" colony simply hates the idea of wasted energy. An hour on a spin bike generator for a fried egg. Yeah, happy memories, happy indeed.
EQUIPMENT_NAVICOMP Navicomp $1$2$4 EQUIPMENT_NAVICOMP_LORE Finally! Screw those paper maps! Now we look like a space military and not like some dirty pirates from the 21st century. Stupid, 21st century, freaking middle ages!
EQUIPMENT_TAX_COLLECTORS_WHIP Tax Collectors Whip $1$2$4 EQUIPMENT_TAX_COLLECTORS_WHIP_LORE No pain - no gain... Literally! And this time, as a bonus, it is not your pain!
EQUIPMENT_PARADE_BANNER Parade Banner EQUIPMENT_PARADE_BANNER_DESCRIPTION Shows a commander as your strongest hero. The commander will appear stronger than they actually are, forcing the enemy to question whether to attack or run. Does not work on commanders with the Spy skill (Similar to the Barbarian horde ability.) EQUIPMENT_PARADE_BANNER_LORE A relic from the Holy War. In its shadow, even a dozen of weary fighters looks like a whole company ready to crusade like there is no tomorrow!
EQUIPMENT_ENCOURAGEMENT_WHIP Encouragement Whip $1$2$4 EQUIPMENT_ENCOURAGEMENT_WHIP_LORE Move you maggots! Every crack reeks of mutiny but whip is certainly one of the most cost-effective encouraging tools. It has been proven not only by mankind's history.
EQUIPMENT_AUXILIARY_GENERATOR Capacitor EQUIPMENT_AUXILIARY_GENERATOR_DESCRIPTION EQUIPMENT_AUXILIARY_GENERATOR_DESCRIPTION EQUIPMENT_AUXILIARY_GENERATOR_LORE Every campaign eventually comes to the point when you desperately need to plug yet another field fridge, tactical hair dryer, or predator-class laser cannon into the overloaded network.
EQUIPMENT_FUEL_ADDITIVES Fuel Additives EQUIPMENT_FUEL_ADDITIVES_DESCRIPTION EQUIPMENT_FUEL_ADDITIVES_DESCRIPTION EQUIPMENT_FUEL_ADDITIVES_LORE Banned in the Solar system about 20 years ago. Too late for penguins though. Although we cultivate substitutes, everybody knows the wild ones tasted much, much better
EQUIPMENT_TURRET_JAMMER Turret Jammer EQUIPMENT_TURRET_JAMMER_DESCRIPTION Commander is ignored by enemy turrets. EQUIPMENT_TURRET_JAMMER_LORE The remote control was the gate to their system and the so-called impenetrable firewall turned silent with just a few lines in PHP. Oh my!
EQUIPMENT_HAZMAT_GEAR Hazmat Gear EQUIPMENT_HAZMAT_GEAR_DESCRIPTION Protects the commander against the effects of toxic fog. EQUIPMENT_HAZMAT_GEAR_LORE Really, it's just duct tape, foil, plexiglass, a breather. Imagine, the poorest workers in Jupiter belt cannot afford even this basic level of protection. Get involved! Even a small amount may change lives!
EQUIPMENT_LOCKPICKER Lockpicker $1$2$4 EQUIPMENT_LOCKPICKER_LORE Did you think you just shoot the open button with your blaster and it just opens? This is not a movie and you are not a space smuggler with a 7 feet 6 inches tall furry friend by your side.
EQUIPMENT_RECON_DRONE Recon Drone EQUIPMENT_RECON_DRONE_DESCRIPTION Increases commander scouting range. EQUIPMENT_RECON_DRONE_LORE The holy texts of Children of the Source describe a pair of moths that fly all over the world and bring information to the Allmother. Funny how certain elements are universal for a number of religions.
EQUIPMENT_LURE Lure $1$2$4 EQUIPMENT_LURE_LORE Feromon-based lures are absolute necessities for the Fossorian hunters. Partly due to the poor eyesight of the mole-people, partly due to the high consumption of fermented beverages. But to be fair, the latter applies to almost every hunter in the universe.
EQUIPMENT_DEEP_SCANNER Deep Scanner $1$2$4 EQUIPMENT_DEEP_SCANNER_LORE After an endless row of useless doomsday devices, you found the first real contribution of Fossorian science that is providing a genuine benefit and making the world a better place to live! Also, nobody is going to believe you!
EQUIPMENT_PROSPECTOR_DATABANK Prospector Databank $1$2$4 EQUIPMENT_PROSPECTOR_DATABANK_LORE Scribbled notes in Fossorian script and chaotic map sketches! Mole prospectors are greedy bastards! Usually, they keep the info about the richest sites to themselves but this time the nuggets will fill your pockets! Let's dig!
